original: Lundberg, Sven Lorentz, apotekare, Norrköping,, f. 5/8/86 i Löve^stad, Malmöhus 1., av Lars L. o. Charlotte Astedt. G. 27 m. Gertrud Jonasson. — Mog:ex. i Lund 05, farm. kand. 14, apot:ex. 24. Elev v. apot. Hjorten i Lund 11-13, anst. där, v. Svanen i Kristianstad, Fläkta Örn i Malmö 15-17, apot. i Västervik o. Bjuv, Pantern i Karlskr. 18-21, Tre Kronor i KarLskr., apot. i Kävlinge, Pantern i Karlskr., åter i Kävlinge, Råneå, Tre Kronor i Karlskr., apot. i Vrigstad 27-38 (före-ist.), priv. å apot. i Jämshög 38, å Svanen i Norrköp. sed. 46.
translated: Lundberg, Sven Lorentz, pharmacist, Norrköping, b. 5/8/1886 in Lövestad, Malmöhus county, son of Lars L. and Charlotte Astedt. Married on 27th in marriage to Gertrud Jonasson. — Completed his bachelor's degree in Pharmacy in Lund in 1905, graduated as a pharmacist in 1914, obtained his pharmacy license in 1924. Was a student at Hjorten pharmacy in Lund from 1911-1913, employed there, at Svanen pharmacy in Kristianstad, Fläkta Örn pharmacy in Malmö from 1915-1917, pharmacist in Västervik and Bjuv, Pantern pharmacy in Karlskrona from 1918-1921, Tre Kronor pharmacy in Karlskrona, pharmacist in Kävlinge, Pantern pharmacy in Karlskrona, back in Kävlinge, Råneå, Tre Kronor pharmacy in Karlskrona, pharmacist in Vrigstad from 1927-1938 (former position), private at Jämshög pharmacy in 1938, at Svanen pharmacy in Norrköping since 1946.
